imdb.plot outline: In Shark Tank South Africa, entrepreneurs go up in front of a panel of esteemed successful South African business moguls, known as the "sharks", who are willing to invest their own money and time in deserving and potentially lucrative business ideas. The trick is in convincing these highly critical and experienced sharks that it will be worth their while to bankroll your business, product or invention.
imdb.title: Shark Tank: South Africa
plot: Entrepreneurs go up in front of a panel of esteemed successful South African business moguls, known as the "sharks".::M-Net

In Shark Tank South Africa, entrepreneurs go up in front of a panel of esteemed successful South African business moguls, known as the "sharks", who are willing to invest their own money and time in deserving and potentially lucrative business ideas. The trick is in convincing these highly critical and experienced sharks that it will be worth their while to bankroll your business, product or invention.::M-Net
